name: LUXURY HO CHI MINH CITY - CU CHI TUNNELS FULL DAY GROUP TOUR
description:
Experience the bustling city of Ho Chi Minh and the historic
outskirts of Cu Chi, as you explore these 2 iconic cities. Venture to the
impressive network of tunnels in Cu Chi, and then make your way to the lively
city for a tour some of its most popular destinations and markets.
